      • predict

        public com.google.common.collect.Multimap<java.lang.String,IRCSearchResult> predict(java.lang.String firstLabel,
                                                                                    java.lang.String secondLabel,
                                                                                    java.lang.Iterable<java.lang.String> features)
        Uses the given label combination to select a search space. Then the search spaces will be queried for the features
        Parameters:
        firstLabel - first detected entity label
        secondLabel - second detected entity label
        features - a set of features for the given entity
        Returns:
        a prediction of results for each feature (f --> 2^R)
